snippet.title: Sally Face - PlayStation and Xbox Trailer
snippet.description:
The dark mystery is coming to PS4, PS5, Xbox One and Series S|X on April 15th!  

Pre-Order on Xbox now: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/sally-face/9n1c74g2jxhm

This release will also include new Spanish and French translations. These languages will be available on other platforms in the near future. 

ABOUT SALLY FACE
Delve into an unsettling adventure following a boy with a prosthetic face, as he uses his handheld video game system to speak with the dead and learn their stories. After a string of mysterious murders, Sal and his three friends discover something truly sinister casting shadows over their small town.
